title: I'm Ripe For The Taking
alternative_title: Boku wa Ureta Gochisou ; ぼくは熟れたごちそう
status: Boku wa Ureta Gochisou ; ぼくは熟れたごちそう
description:
Description :
        "Let me indulge in your riped body from over the last 20 years" A playful popular guy  a pure, inexperienced virgin (with some experience), in a teasing BL romance! Yuzuki, a university student often told he's too serious and innocent, secretly struggles with unfulfilled desires and spends his days exploring his own body. One day, he makes up his mind to visit a gay meeting spot and encounters Chiaki, a charismatic guy who's exactly his type. Swept off his feet by Chiaki's gentlemen-like behavior, Yuzuki finds himself thinking, "I want him to be my first." Before he knows it, they're in a love hotel. At last, he's about to graduate from being a virgin... or so he thinks. "You're too sensitive," Chiaki teases, as he keeps Yuzuki on edge with slow, lingering touches, leaving him craving more.+
